participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introverted but adventurous, enjoys spending time in fantasy worlds.
participant_1.background: i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home.

participant_2.name: Lena
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and thrill-seeking, loves trying new experiences and sharing food.
participant_2.background: i love rollercoasters and sky diving. i'm a vegan and i love hummus. hello i just moved here from germany. i do like watching cooking shows.

content.text: I love rollercoasters and sky diving
